Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.client

Class CartServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.client.CartServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet("/cart")
public class CartServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The CartServlet is a servlet which task is to show a customer the cart, and edit it, if necessary. Only doGet method is overridden.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • doGet

        protected void doGet​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                     java.io.IOException
        doGet method handles GET request. Shows the cart to a customer. If request parameter action contains one of commands increase, decrease, delete, and add increases or decreases the quantity, deletes or adds a book which id is specified in request parameter id. Map representing the cart is stored in the instance of HttpSession.
        Overrides:
        doGet in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object provided by Tomcat.
        response - HttpServletResponse object provided by Tomcat.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown if the request for the GET could not be handled.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an input or output exception occurs.

      • prepareRequest

        private void prepareRequest​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> cart)
                     throws DbException,
                            DaoException,
                            BadRequestException
        prepareRequest is a utility method which sets cart attribute to a HttpSession object. For each row in the cart looks up for a Book with the specified id and stores it in the detailedCart.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object provided by Tomcat.
        cart - Map containing information about current books and quantities in the cart.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if data cannot be retrieved.
        DaoException - is thrown if DAO cannot be instantiated.
        BadRequestException - is thrown if attempting to add a book which is not present in the table books.
